songs.title: How It’s Done
songs.lyrics:
Not your brother’s bitch
I’m geting my nuts off too man
Hey yeah
I fucked a coop
Let a bitch twist  one for Eazy
With an attitude like nigga
Fuck you pay me
Lost in the interior
Grow like weedzies
Probably like why
Can’t see the west coast
Need me
Niggas on Instagram like
This gonna make em believe me
Loving on Twitter though
Talking  real breezy
Chest in cheetos
You niggas look cheezy
And I ain’t talking about
Tacky homies talking aobut
Voila
Talking 911
With the gun
Da da da
Miami mess you
Who one test to shout out
Shout out
I’ll be fucking bitches in the mouth
And tell them Allah
So I can get back to the money
And the powder
Watch me go thugging now
I ain’t gotta holla

Talked to a bitch
Made her fill her out
In Prada
Rich niggas we have this stuff
My momma taks Allah
Add to the Mac 10
Man keep your dollar

That’s word Rich niggas still repping and turf
And that’s word
That’s why send the bitch have a pill in her purse
And that’s word
Get the funds any which way it comes
Holla and spend a dollar I’ll show you how it’s done
And that’s word

That’s word
Rich niggas still repping the turf
That’s word
Send the bitch have a pill in her purse
That’s word
Get the funds any which way it comes
Holla and spend a dollar I’ll show you how it’s done
That’s word

Rich young nigga been had his change up
New nigga slang boy you need to step your game up
Pyrex on the stove with the flame up
Jumped in the low key and put the range up
Hit a few corners though, I’m trap checking
You get the bronze in this marathon you left second

I get the gold I get the dough from the shows
The stroll and the hoes
How do you suppose I talk a bitch about her clothes
And I counts get the gab get the cash
Then I tell that hoe to bounce

Bounce bitch

Young boss nigga bitch I got shit to do
Get a lick, cop a brick, make a flip
Or two
And I’m so disrespectful when I spit at you
I ain’t talking no shit I’m speaking literal
Cause I’m a loc from the CPT
Young Nutty Mr. OBG

Motherfucker
That’s Word
Rich niggas still repping the turf
That’s Word
Send the bitch have a pill in her purse
That’s Word
Get the funds any which way it comes
Holla and spend a dollar I’ll show you how it’s done
That’s Word


Rich niggas still repping the turf
That’s Word
Send the bitch have a pill in her purse
That’s Word
Get the funds any which way it comes
Holla and spend a dollar I’ll show you how it’s done
That’s Word


You ain’t fucking with me
This ain’t a threesome
Turn my back on the fam nigga that’s
Treason urn
North side Saint Louis
Rep the turf
Words trying to work in water
But they on sermon
Seen one city block
Make a mil or more annual
I’ll show you how it’s done
Here’s the manual
When it come to hustlng
I got oxes like a bolder bag
Pimping it was paper
On the platter
Then I hold it down
Somewhere on the island
LIke a colder back
Rip the same circle
Real niggas in my cul de sac
Rolling three ails on a cul de sac
And man about his veeg
He’s a slugger back
And I come hard with a rubber ass
Pay attention
Lay the ground work for your Thundercats
Look I’m  from the Cinder Ho Tribe
Why send the ho later
I can send the ho now


Rich niggas still repping the turf
And that’s word
Send the bitch have a pill in her purse
And that’s word
Get the funds any which way it comes
Holla and spend a dollar I’ll show you how it’s done
And that’s word

That’s word
Rich niggas still repping the turf
And that’s word
Send the bitch have a pill in her purse
And that’s word
Get the funds any which way it comes
Holla and spend a dollar I’ll show you how it’s done

And that’s word
